vietnamcovid19 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Create function to generate reference

output_ref.Rd

This function provides the list of R packages and external resources added in the Reference section

output_ref(type)

Arguments

type

The type of references, either 'packages' or 'link'

Examples

library(shiny)
output_ref("link")
